titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate condemning the tactic of soliciting support for the use of violence against abortion providers and activists.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/25/1994--Introduced. Condemns the tactics of extremist individuals and groups concerning abortion which are designed to sow the seeds of hatred, including soliciting, promoting, encouraging, or carrying out murderous acts of violence against abortion providers and activists.
